title: Numpy deprecation warning

labels.name: help wanted
labels.description: Indicates that a maintainer wants help on an issue or pull request

labels.name: awaiting feedback
labels.description: Indicates that further information is required from the issue creator

body:
Hi, 
when running pytest for the function 

`shap.TreeExplainer()`

I have the following deprecation warning:

`NPY_ARRAY_UPDATEIFCOPY, NPY_ARRAY_INOUT_ARRAY, and NPY_ARRAY_INOUT_FARRAY are deprecated, use NPY_WRITEBACKIFCOPY, NPY_ARRAY_INOUT_ARRAY2, or NPY_ARRAY_INPUT_FARRAY2 respectively instead, and call PyArray_ResolveWritebackIfCopy before the array is deallocated, i.e. before the last call to Py_DECREF.`

I think that the issue is related to the following lines:
https://github.com/slundberg/shap/blob/c7beff31d2ed2673d1a1b7c2a29f94aacc89c50e/shap/_cext.cc#L75
https://github.com/slundberg/shap/blob/c7beff31d2ed2673d1a1b7c2a29f94aacc89c50e/shap/_cext.cc#L159
https://github.com/slundberg/shap/blob/c7beff31d2ed2673d1a1b7c2a29f94aacc89c50e/shap/_cext.cc#L281
https://github.com/slundberg/shap/blob/c7beff31d2ed2673d1a1b7c2a29f94aacc89c50e/shap/_cext.cc#L376

Thanks for your attention!
